mapper.sql: SELECT A.id AS video_id , A.sound_id , A.channel_id , A.video_path , A.video_thumbnail , A.video_tags , A.video_description , A.flag_open , A.view_cnt , A.flag_use , A.created_at , A.updated_at , B.rank_id , B.win_type , B.week_idx , F.win_date , F.month_idx , F.week_idx , F.total_score_1 , F.total_score_2 , F.total_score_3 , F.judge_cnt

FROM tb_video A Left Join tb_video_win_rank_list B ON A.id = B.video_id Left Join tb_channel C ON A.channel_id = C.id Left Join tb_member D ON C.user_id = D.id Left Join tb_winner_list F ON A.id = F.video_id AND D.id = F.user_id AND F.week_idx = B.week_idx
mapper.select:
AND D.id = #{user_id}
ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC, A.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zarangzill.tb_video (sound_id, channel_id, video_path, video_thumbnail, video_tags, video_description, flag_open, view_cnt, flag_use, created_at) VALUES (#{sound_id} ,#{ channel_id} ,#{ video_path} ,#{ video_thumbnail} ,#{ video_tags} ,#{ video_description} ,#{ flag_open} ,#{ view_cnt} ,#{ flag_use} ,sysdate());
